description:
Danny welcomes ðŸ‘‘Bethenny Frankel to Everything Iconic. They discuss her businesses, new podcast, relief efforts, WAP controversy, Scary Island, and lots more!


Bethenny Interview: 7:42ish


PS Subscribe to Danny's spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, which launches season 2 on October 28!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
